text: The landlord may evict the tenant without notice if rent is delayed by 5 days.
label: RISKY

text: The landlord and tenant agree to a one-month notice period for termination.
label: SAFE

text: Security deposit will be forfeited entirely upon minor damage.
label: RISKY

text: The landlord must refund the security deposit within fifteen days after lease termination.
label: SAFE

text: Tenant is responsible for all maintenance including structural repairs.
label: RISKY

text: The landlord shall handle major repairs while the tenant covers minor maintenance.
label: SAFE

text: The tenant must pay property tax.
label: RISKY

text: Either party may terminate the tenancy by giving one-month written notice.
label: SAFE

text: Rent shall be increased by 20% every six months without negotiation.
label: RISKY

text: The rent shall be revised only by mutual agreement once a year.
label: SAFE
